result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Anthony Chase Litton
Current: 600 Klein Drive, #3, Hammond, WI 54015 United States  (Effective: 09-29-2022)
Prior: 1015 Vine Street, #B, Hammond, WI 54015
Plea/sentencing hearing on November 21, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Misdemeanor and Criminal Traffic Scheduling Order. Signed by SJN on 8/1/2022. c: DA and Atty via e-file. km

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Christen Litton.  The term "abusive contact" is hereby defined as a verbal assault or an intentional infliction of or threat to inflict physical pain, physical injury or illness, an impairment of physical condition, and /or sexual contact or sexual intercourse without consent.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats. THIS CONDITION SHALL ONLY BE EFFECTIVE UPON THE EXPIRATION OF A 72 HOUR NO CONTACT ORDER.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

1:03 PM CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: K. Anderson, Prosecuting attorney Erica Ellenwood and Intern Ali Casey in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Robert A Wertheimer in court for Anthony Chase Litton. Defendant Anthony Chase Litton in court. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Waives reading. NG.  Waives speedy trial. Court sets bond. Court sets SETC and PSC. Adjourned: 1:05 PM. kma
